Token.Abstract: GMLanguage is a class that loads a language used by the other components in this kit. Typically languages are stored in plist files with the extension .language and the language name as the name of the file.
Loads a language plist from a given URL.

Parameter.Name: url
Parameter.Abstract: The accessible url where to find the language declaration.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns a new language dictionary instance if the file was found and parsed properly, otherwise nil.

Token.Abstract: Loads a language plist from a given path.

Parameter.Name: path
Parameter.Abstract: The accessible filesystem path where to find the language declaration.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns a new language dictionary instance if the file was found and parsed properly, otherwise nil.

Token.Abstract: Loads a language plist from the application bundle.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns a new language dictionary instance if the file was found and parsed properly, otherwise nil.

Token.Abstract: Processes a dictionary, turning certain strings into regular expressions and also turning arrays of dictionaries into ordered dictionaries.
